name: Bread War
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

couch multiplayer game, so use parsec or any alternative to test it out over the network for now you can use both controllers and keyboard

left stick forward/W: go forward left stick right & left / A & D: rotate your duck

Xbox X/ playstation square/ Switch Y/ space key: attack the other player or eat the bread, your duck must  face the object to affect it

At each retry, you need to click any button on controller or keyboard to enter the game

you cannot control the end game menu with the controller or the keyboard, use the mouse

OBJECTIVE:

 be the player with the most eaten bread  you can also harrass the other player, it reduces his speed

Authors: Raphael "PainStalker" St-Louis and Samuel "Gosfi" Lefrançois
